bio.p: Niall MacKay is a mathematical physicist working at the University of York, UK. Over the last few years he has developed an interest in the mathematical modeling of warfare, and especially in generalizations of Lanchester models. Recent publications include papers on the Battle of Britain for Naval Research Logistics and History.
